public class DBNetwork
extends BrowsableNetwork

Network class that loads data from a database and sets the graph

David Garcia Becerra

Method that adds to the network the neighboring nodes up to certain distance from a center.

Parameters:
id - from the node to start the search from
distance - maximum depth
forward - whether the traversal is forward or backward
